content: निभृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Placed down, deposited, lowered. {@--2@} Filled with, full of; चिंतया निभृतः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--3@} Concealed, hidden, out of sight, unperceved, unobserved; निभृतो भूत्वा <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; नभसा निभृतेंदुना <ls>R. 8. 15</ls> ‘with the moon become invisible, about to set or go down’; <ls>Ve. 6. 2</ls>, <ls>Śi. 6. 20.</ls> {@--4@} Secret, covert; <ls>Śi. 13. 42.</ls> {@--5@} ({%a%}) Still, silent; निभृतद्विरेफं ( काननं) <ls>Ku. 3. 42</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">6. 2.</ls> ({%b%}) Steady, fixed, immoveable, motionless; <ls>Ś. 1. 8.</ls> {@--6@} Mild, gentle; अनिभृता वायवः <ls>Ki. 13. 66</ls> ‘not gentle, violent or strong’; <ls>Māl. 2. 12</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 14.</ls> {@--7@} Modest, humble; अनिभृतकरेषु प्रियेषु <ls>Me. 68</ls>; प्रणामनिभृता कुलवधूरिव <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--8@} Firm, resolute. {@--9@} Lonely, solitary; निभृतनिकुंजगृहं गतया <ls>Gīt. 2.</ls> {@--10@} Shut, closed (as a door). {@--11@} True, faithful, firmly attached. --तं Modesty, humility. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Secretly, covertly, privatly, unperceived; <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 74</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 263.</ls> {@--2@} Silently, quietly; <ls>K. 134.</ls> {@--3@} Out of sight, in a corner.
